array.string: This green and creamy smoothie is the perfect lactose-free alternative to traditional yoghurt. Start your day of with this healthy bowl topped with fresh berries, nuts and seeds and you will be energized for hours

This green and creamy smoothie is the perfect lactose-free alternative to traditional yoghurt. Start your day of with this healthy bowl topped with fresh berries, nuts and seeds and you will be energized for hours
Mix everything in a blender on high speed until smooth
Add a small amount of water if necessary

This green and creamy smoothie is the perfect lactose-free alternative to traditional yoghurt. Start your day of with this healthy bowl topped with fresh berries, nuts and seeds and you will be energized for hours
